Package ch.decent.sdk.api

Class CallbackApi

  • BaseApi
    • ch.decent.sdk.api.CallbackApi

  • public class CallbackApi
extends BaseApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.Single<kotlin.Unit> cancelAll()
      Stop receiving any notifications. This unsubscribes from all subscribed objects (CallbackApi.onGlobal and AccountApi.getFullAccounts).
      io.reactivex.Flowable<java.lang.String> onBlockApplied()
      Receive new block notifications. Cannot be cancelled.
      io.reactivex.Flowable<kotlin.Unit> onContentUpdate(java.lang.String uri)
      Receive notifications on content update. Cannot be cancelled.
      io.reactivex.Flowable<kotlin.Unit> onGlobal(boolean clearFilter)
      Subscribe to callbacks. Can be cancelled. with CallbackApi.cancelAll.
      io.reactivex.Flowable<kotlin.Unit> onPendingTransaction()
      Receive notifications on pending transactions. Cannot be cancelled.

      • Methods inherited from class ch.decent.sdk.api.BaseApi

        getApi

    • Method Detail

      • cancelAll

        public io.reactivex.Single<kotlin.Unit> cancelAll()

        Stop receiving any notifications. This unsubscribes from all subscribed objects (CallbackApi.onGlobal and AccountApi.getFullAccounts).

        See Also:
        CallbackApi.onGlobal, AccountApi.getFullAccounts

      • onBlockApplied

        public io.reactivex.Flowable<java.lang.String> onBlockApplied()

        Receive new block notifications. Cannot be cancelled.

      • onContentUpdate

        public io.reactivex.Flowable<kotlin.Unit> onContentUpdate(java.lang.String uri)

        Receive notifications on content update. Cannot be cancelled.

        Parameters:
        uri - content URI to monitor

      • onPendingTransaction

        public io.reactivex.Flowable<kotlin.Unit> onPendingTransaction()

        Receive notifications on pending transactions. Cannot be cancelled.

      • onGlobal

        public io.reactivex.Flowable<kotlin.Unit> onGlobal(boolean clearFilter)

        Subscribe to callbacks. Can be cancelled. with CallbackApi.cancelAll.

        Parameters:
        clearFilter - clear current subscriptions created with AccountApi.getFullAccounts
        See Also:
        CallbackApi.cancelAll
